para: This option specifies the file type of the Garmin Mobile XT data being read. Garmin Mobile XT devices can save track data in two formats: Active Track logs and Saved Tracks.

Valid values for this option are:
ATRK (Default): Specifies an Active Track log file. These are the current, ongoing logs recorded by the device.
STRK: Specifies a Saved Track file. These are tracks that have been explicitly saved by the user on the device.
GPSBabel defaults to "ATRK". You only need to specify this option if you are converting a Saved Track file.

example.title: Convert a Garmin Mobile XT Saved Track file
